name: arvis-monorepo
author: SMYRNA INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY NETWORK SERVICES L.L.C
description: Arvis project monorepo: AI-enhanced video meetings

scripts.changelog: export GH_TOKEN=$(gh auth token) && echo "GH_TOKEN: $GH_TOKEN" && nx reset && nx release --dry-run --verbose
scripts.release: export GH_TOKEN=$(gh auth token) && nx release --skip-publish
